name: Boxy Car Racing
description:
IB Project - Abhaiy Dhaliwal

Directions (PLEASE FOLLOW): 

- WASD = Movement

W = forward

A = left

S = back

D = right

C = flip

Spacebar = handbrake

ESC = Pause/Pause Menu

WARNING: The quality of the game were differ based on the specifications of your computer. Also, Windows OS only.
